OS_Coursework

Class Inode

  • java.lang.Object
    • OS_Coursework.Inode

  • public class Inode
extends java.lang.Object
    Contents of the inode information.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Inode

        public Inode(int inodeTablePointer,
             int block,
             java.io.RandomAccessFile f,
             int inodeNumber)
      throws java.io.IOException
        Stores the inode information of a given block and inodenumber.
        Parameters:
        inodeTablePointer - The pointer to the inode table, found within the group descriptor.
        block - The block to read the inode from.
        f - The ext2 file.
        inodeNumber - The inode number to gather information of.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
